title: iOS Engineer
text: A company that focuses on Educational Technology, Widya Edu is the first place that give me an opportunity to do an internship program. From a guy who just spending watching a ton of tutorials to contribute to the real live app, thats nuts. I learnt a lot while being there. When i finished my internship, I was given a contract to work as a sole developer for an app. Being able to start a project from scratch while also having a mentor is such a wonderful experience. I am deeply grateful to them because it was such an invaluable experience.

title: Internship

title: iOS Engineer
text: While Widya Edu offered me the chance to do an internship, Kecilin also offered me with the chance to work as a full-time employee despite the fact that I am a relatively rookie in iOS development. I am aware of how fortunate I am to have this opportunity. We only have 2 iOS developers there, we have a similarity that we both a final semester college student while doing our undergraduate thesis and working at the same time. During the time we have an opportunity to explore and try a lot of new things, including launching the VPN and media compression service-focused product as well as client B2B projects.

title: iOS Engineer
text: After I finished my undergraduate thesis, I had to challenge myself to some extent. Thanks to my previous experiences, I was able to join one of the leading companies in the financial services sector. In Bibit, I have to focus more on improving product quality than fast-paced shipment due to the app's quite large user base. Here I also learn how to collaborate with numerous teams in a highly organized and disciplined manner. During the time, I also spent a lot of time researching and implementing the things that related to the improvement of the app on a deeper level. As well as some tools/systems for the productivity of the internal team itself.
